SELECT f.food_name, f.food_size, f.food_kcal FROM Diet d JOIN Eat e on e.diet_no=d.diet_no JOIN Eatlist el on el.eat_no= e.eat_no JOIN Food f on f.food_cd=el.food_cd WHERE TO_CHAR(d.diet_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = '20230130' AND e.eat_status='breakfast'
